explains: v. 轰击；引爆炸弹（bomb 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: car bombing 车载炸弹爆炸
precision bombing n. 精确轰炸；定点轰炸（等于pin-point bombing）

sentences.en: The rate of bombing has slowed considerably.
sentences.cn: 轰炸频率已经放慢了许多。

sentences.en: Bombing had made roads and railways unusable.
sentences.cn: 轰炸使得公路和铁路都不能用。

sentences.en: Aerial bombing of rebel positions is continuing.
sentences.cn: 对叛军阵地的空中轰炸仍在继续。
